application.name: pad
application.brief: Add NULL padding around a cube
application.description: This program allows the user to specify NULL padding to be placed around the input cube.

history.change: Added AlphaCube group and updating processing text
Now uses the SubArea class to produce output cube labels with corrected Mapping, Instrument, and AlphaCube groups.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: This is the cube which will be padded with NULLs

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: This cube will contain the padded input file

parameter.name: LEFT
parameter.brief: Number of pixels to pad on the left side
parameter.description: This is the number of pixels to pad on the left side of the cube

parameter.name: RIGHT
parameter.brief: Number of pixels to pad on the right side
parameter.description: This is the number of pixels to pad on the right side of the cube

parameter.name: TOP
parameter.brief: Number of pixels to pad on the top edge
parameter.description: This is the number of pixels to pad on the top edge of the cube

parameter.name: BOTTOM
parameter.brief: Number of pixels to pad on the bottom edge
parameter.description: This is the number of pixels to pad on the bottom edge of the cube
